excerpt.rendered:
2017/ESB-8841/03
Cask Type: European Oak Sherry Butt
Distilled: 6 August 2003
Bottled: 30 August 2017
One of 612 bottles

Nose: Rounded and balanced, with rich dates and sultanas. Hints of toffee and chocolate.
Taste: Full bodied with sweet toffee and oak, juicy raisins with a background of ground ginger
Finish: Lasting sweet mouth coating

Bottle size : 700
Distillery : Macallan
Age : 14
Vintage : 2003
ABV : 60.8%
